short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Represents housing data from willhaben.at search results and displays on a map

IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER:
This is an unofficial browser extension created by an independent developer. WillMap is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to Willhaben or any of its parent companies. This is a third-party tool created to enhance the user experience but is not an official Willhaben product.
This extension is completely free and was created for educational purposes only.
It is provided as-is to help users learn about and experiment with map-based property search visualization.

Transform your Willhaben housing search into an interactive map experience!

Key Features:
üó∫Ô∏è Instant Map Visualization: See all search results plotted on a user-friendly map.
üìç Location at a Glance: Quickly assess the location of each property listing.
üè† Detailed Popups: Click on map markers to view essential property details.
üîç Enhanced Search Experience: Combine Willhaben's powerful filters with geographical insights.
üí® Seamless Integration: Works directly on Willhaben's search results page with no extra steps.

How It Works:

1. Install WillMap and navigate to Willhaben's real estate section.
2. Perform your search as usual.
3. Watch as your results automatically appear on an interactive map above the listing.

WillMap helps you make informed decisions by providing a clear geographical context for your housing options.
Whether you're renting or buying, get a bird's-eye view of your potential new home's location and surrounding area.

Perfect for:
- House hunters looking to understand neighborhood dynamics
- Renters exploring new areas
- Real estate professionals seeking efficient ways to present options

Discover the perfect location for your next home with WillMap ‚Äì Your visual guide to Willhaben's housing market!

Privacy Notice: WillMap respects your privacy and only processes data already visible in your Willhaben search results.
